count.description:
The total number of rows.
To enable server side pagination for an unknown number of items, provide -1.

getItemAriaLabel.description:
Accepts a function which returns a string value that provides a user-friendly name for the current page. This is important for screen reader users.
For localization purposes, you can use the provided translations.

typeDescriptions.type: The link or button type to format ('first' | 'last' | 'next' | 'previous').

labelDisplayedRows.description:
Customize the displayed rows label. Invoked with a { from, to, count, page } object.
For localization purposes, you can use the provided translations.

labelId.description: Id of the label element within the pagination.

labelRowsPerPage.description:
Customize the rows per page label.
For localization purposes, you can use the provided translations.

onPageChange.description: Callback fired when the page is changed.

typeDescriptions.event: The event source of the callback.

onRowsPerPageChange.description: Callback fired when the number of rows per page is changed.

typeDescriptions.event: The event source of the callback.

page.description: The zero-based index of the current page.

rowsPerPage.description:
The number of rows per page.
Set -1 to display all the rows.

rowsPerPageOptions.description: Customizes the options of the rows per page select field. If less than two options are available, no select field will be displayed. Use -1 for the value with a custom label to show all the rows.

selectId.description: Id of the select element within the pagination.

slotProps.description: The props used for each slot inside the TablePagination.

slots.description: The components used for each slot inside the TablePagination. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.

root.description: Class name applied to the root element.

slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the root.
slotDescriptions.actions: The component that renders the actions.
slotDescriptions.select: The component that renders the select.
slotDescriptions.selectLabel: The component that renders the select label.
slotDescriptions.menuItem: The component that renders the menu item.
slotDescriptions.displayedRows: The component that renders the displayed rows.
slotDescriptions.toolbar: The component that renders the toolbar.
slotDescriptions.spacer: The component that renders the spacer.

signature.type: function(event: React.MouseEvent<HTMLButtonElement> | null, page: number) => void

type.name: shape
type.description:
{ actions?: func
| object, displayedRows?: func
| object, menuItem?: func
| object, root?: func
| object, select?: func
| object, selectLabel?: func
| object, spacer?: func
| object, toolbar?: func
| object }

type.name: shape
type.description: { actions?: elementType, displayedRows?: elementType, menuItem?: elementType, root?: elementType, select?: elementType, selectLabel?: elementType, spacer?: elementType, toolbar?: elementType }

slots.name: root
slots.description: The component that renders the root.

slots.name: actions
slots.description: The component that renders the actions.

slots.name: select
slots.description: The component that renders the select.

slots.description: The component that renders the select label.

slots.description: The component that renders the menu item.
